Author: naturally_sourced
Text: I LOVE the taste of ACV but I totally get you about the taste. Are you diluting it enough? I usually have a teaspoon to at least 8oz. Also adding ice and drinking through a straw makes it seem like I'm having a fancy cocktail.  Other drinks I inhale after a binge and find helpful: tea (green, peppermint, chamomile, "digestion" blend teas), kombucha (which actually gives the same benefits as ACV), and warm water with lemon. Good luck!
